name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Salesforce Engineer with proven expertise in **Salesforce**, **Flow Builder**, and **n8n** to create low-code automation solutions. Adept at developing AI-enhanced applications, leveraging analytical thinking to optimize workflows and enhance user experiences. Skilled in ensuring security and compliance across solutions, with a strong understanding of best practices to align with industry standards.

Possessing 13+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, proficient in both frontend and backend development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Demonstrated ability in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Successfully deployed cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, employing strategies such as microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Solid background in compliance-driven development, with experience in HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong expertise in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
